name: Hidden Objects Carnival – Best Seek and Find Games
name_original: Hidden Objects Carnival – Best Seek and Find Games
description:
Get ready for the carnival! Take your costume, pick your mask and let the party started! Download Hidden Objects Carnival – Best Seek and Find Games and experience the fantastic adventure in your life. Have a great time playing this popular object searching game with multiple levels. Clean up the hidden objects and don't let this be a carnival of horror. Make this party better than the carnival in Rio, Notting Hill or in Venice.

Hidden Objects Carnival – Best Seek and Find Games features:

🔍 Adventure mystery game free localized into 15 languages!
🔍 More than 1000 hidden objects to find in this wonder world!
🔍 Multiple levels with mystery places full of cool hidden objects!
🔍 Fantastic 3D game design that will leave you speechless!
🔍 Find the hidden object from the list below & click on it!
🔍 Click on the magnifying glass button to help you find the object!
🔍 For mobile phones only! - Zoom in the picture to find the objects easily!
🔍 Move the picture when it is zoomed to search for hidden object!
🔍 Zoom out at any moment you like to see the mystery scene again!


🍀 ADDITIONAL MYSTERY HIDDEN OBJECT GAME FEATURES: 🍀

🍀 Picture search for finding hidden objects quickly and easily!
🔍 Silhouette hidden object – a challenging level for finding items!
🍀 Word scramble game level – a hard level to find hidden figures!
🔍 Flashlight or a night mode level – use the light to seek for items!
🍀 Match Pairs – a memory game with colorful cards to pair!
🔍 Find the difference – a mini game placed among the hidden objects!
🍀 Time limit game - bonus level to train your brain and concentration!


Let the carnival adventure begin! Download this fantastic mystery hidden objects searching game for free and join the party. But watch out! There is a mess everywhere, and the party cannot start. Search and find the objects that are not in the right place and clean up the mess. Make enough space for everyone who loves carnival games to enjoy. It is the time of the year when you can put the best costume and go out to have fun. Keep the carnival spirit, find the hidden figures and enjoy playing one of the most addictive concentration games for adults on the market.

Play one of the most addictive object search adventure games!

Make a detective investigation! Somebody wants to ruin the carnival magic. They destroyed everything on their way and want to turn this to a scary carnival. Search for the lost evidence and find the bad guys. Play Hidden Objects Carnival – Best Seek and Find Games and be sure that this doesn't become an adventure escape midnight carnival. This is the job for a police detective, but you should try your detective skills and use your concentration in order to solve the case.

Best carnival hidden object games 2019 for all generations!

Play mystery hidden object adventure game with carnival theme and feel like you are a part of the scene. If you love watching the circus, going to the amusement park, or be a part of the greatest open-air costume party, Hidden Objects Carnival – Best Seek and Find Games is a perfect concentration game free download for you. Feel the excitement while playing this puzzle hidden object game and be sure that this addictive game can completely kill your boredom and amuse you.

Find hidden objects in pictures – play the brain game in your language!

Hidden Objects Carnival – Best Seek and Find Games app is translated into 15 most popular world languages, so you can enjoy playing in your own language. But this can also be the best language learning game if you switch the language of the carnival game. Exercise your vocabulary and train your brain at the same time while having fun all day. This is a unique seek and find hidden object game that will show you the atmosphere of a funfair and entertain you like no game before. Start the carnival countdown right now!
